expertise.title: Our Industry And Expertise
expertise.description: We are deeply engaged in the semiconductor, information technology, and mobile device industries, providing business development and professional sales services for high-tech products.

who.description:
Watson Bell was established in 1997. For over two decades, we have been dedicated to promoting innovative technologies and high-quality products, helping global partners expand into the Greater China market.
With extensive hands-on experience, we previously represented Samsung SDI lithium batteries and achieved outstanding results, accounting for 70% of its annual production sales in a single year and ranking second in global market share.
Leveraging our professional consulting expertise and strong local resources, we assist partners in strategically positioning themselves in the market, strengthening competitiveness, and building long-term, stable partnerships with a results-driven approach.

To create value for our clients and let our partners’ brands shine.

history2025_1.item1: Glory Zenith Group specializes in diamond heat sink technology. Leveraging our autonomous core patents and precision manufacturing capabilities, we provide highly efficient and reliable thermal management solutions for 5G communications, optical networks, advanced chipsets, and high-power electronic devices.
history2025_1.item2: In response to the thermal management bottlenecks caused by ever-increasing power densities, we utilize the exceptional thermal conductivity of diamond (>2000 W/m·K) to push cooling materials beyond their traditional physical limits.
history2025_1.item3: Through three milestone breakthroughs—“Large-size Synthesis,“ ”High-orientation High-speed Growth,“ and ”Key Proprietary Technologies“—Glory Zenith Group has established a complete mass-production workflow, from material growth to component fabrication. We are driving the transition of diamond heat sinks from laboratory research to industrial application, positioning ourselves as a pivotal partner in thermal management for high-power electronics and advanced semiconductors.

history2025_2.title: One of the most used static code analyzers in the world.
history2025_2.item1: Cppcheck Premium is a static code analysis tool developed by Cppcheck Solutions AB, a Swedish company specializing in software quality assurance for C and C++.
history2025_2.item2: Advanced Analysis & Compliance — Designed to deliver high-level code inspections, certification support, and compliance with industry standards.
history2025_2.item3: Trusted by Developers Worldwide — Cppcheck is highly respected within the global C/C++ development community. Its open-source version is widely praised for efficient and precise error detection, while the paid Premium edition further provides enterprise-grade features and professional technical support.

history2014.title: Pioneer of fingerprint biometrics recognition algorithm
history2014.item1: Our algorithm has become a core technology trusted by leading smart device brands such as Samsung and Xiaomi, and is also utilized in Xiaomi’s premium smart door lock lineup.
history2014.item2: Despite the global impact of COVID-19 and a sharp decline in smartphone shipments, our business continued to achieve steady growth.
history2014.item3: Entered the supply chain of major Korean smartphone brands and became the global market leader in optical fingerprint recognition algorithms for Android devices.
history2014.item4: Expanded the optical fingerprint recognition algorithm business, achieved second ranking in market share across Greater China.

history2012.title:
Pavoradi (Watson Bell own brand)
LED Lamp & lighting design
history2012.item1: The in-house brand Pavoradi successfully entered the China market of the French luxury group Louis Vuitton (LV) and completed the lighting design project for the LV flagship store at Kerry Centre, Shanghai.

history2007.title:
Axiom MicroDevices Inc. (USA)
World’s first GSM mobile phone CMOS power amplifier
history2007.item1: Axiom achieved rapid sales growth, capturing 20% market share in the power amplifier segment for white-label mobile phones, leading to its subsequent acquisition by a competitor.
history2007.item2: Launched the first CMOS power amplifier successfully adopted in the China GSM mobile phone market, marking a key technological milestone of substitution of GaAS amplifier.

history20072.title:
Hymite A/S (Denmark)
World’s first Silicon MEMS packaging for high power LED
history20072.item1: Successfully assisted Hymite in selling all of its patents at a premium to a world-renowned semiconductor manufacturer, enabling the company’s strategic transformation.

history1999.title: Lithium rechargeable battery
history1999.item1: Maintained stable shipment performance throughout the global financial crisis, enabling SDI to navigate the downturn successfully and solidify its position as a global market leader.
history1999.item2: Accurately anticipated the global financial crisis and helped SDI secure substantial 2009 customer orders through advance sales, generating a record-breaking revenue of USD 460 million.
history1999.item3: Achieved a new sales milestone by handling over 70% of Samsung SDI’s total production, establishing a foundation for long-term partnership.
history1999.item4: Successfully sold Samsung SDI’s first lithium battery, marking the beginning of a lasting collaboration.
